tool_description: This API will show all the latest climate change news from around the world
name: Climate Change Livefeed
title: Climate Change Livefeed

api_list.name: Get individual News Resource
api_list.description: This shows all the news from a specific resource
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-livefeed.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-livefeed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-livefeed.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-livefeed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the available news about climate changes around the world
api_list.code:

url = "https://climate-change-livefeed.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-livefeed.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
